headline: Honeywell lowers sales, profit forecasts after Bombardier agreement
summary: Honeywell's shares fell about 2% to $226 after the bell.  The agreement will provide Honeywell's avionics, propulsion and satellite communication technologies for Bombardier's aircraft.  Honeywell said it expects the agreement to have a near-term impact on its financials, given the investments for research and development.

raw.headline: Honeywell lowers sales, profit forecasts after Bombardier agreement
raw.summary: Honeywell's shares fell about 2% to $226 after the bell.  The agreement will provide Honeywell's avionics, propulsion and satellite communication technologies for Bombardier's aircraft.  Honeywell said it expects the agreement to have a near-term impact on its financials, given the investments for research and development.

headline: Honeywell Stock Falls. Cash Isn’t Coming in as Expected.
summary: Shares of industrial conglomerate  Honeywell  fell in late trading Monday after the company lowered its earnings and free cash flow guidance for 2024.  Honeywell announced an agreement Monday evening with Bombardier to provide technology for its jets.  Honeywell says the value of the agreement is some $17 billion.

raw.headline: Honeywell Stock Falls. Cash Isn’t Coming in as Expected.

Honeywell announced an agreement Monday evening with Bombardier to provide technology for its jets.  Honeywell says the value of the agreement is some $17 billion.

headline: Honeywell’s Investments in Bombardier Partnership Prompt Outlook Cut
summary: Honeywell International signed a strategic agreement with Bombardier, prompting the industrial conglomerate to once again cut its guidance and its stock price to fall.

raw.headline: Honeywell’s Investments in Bombardier Partnership Prompt Outlook Cut
raw.summary: Honeywell International signed a strategic agreement with Bombardier, prompting the industrial conglomerate to once again cut its guidance and its stock price to fall.

headline: Honeywell cuts guidance as Bombardier partnership to lift investment costs
summary: Investin.com -- Honeywell International Inc (NASDAQ:HON) cut its annual guidance on Monday after the jet engine maker struck an investment-heavy partnership with Bombardier aircraft that is expected to keep a lid on its bottom line.

raw.headline: Honeywell cuts guidance as Bombardier partnership to lift investment costs
raw.summary: Investin.com -- Honeywell International Inc (NASDAQ:HON) cut its annual guidance on Monday after the jet engine maker struck an investment-heavy partnership with Bombardier aircraft that is expected to keep a lid on its bottom line.

headline: HONEYWELL AND BOMBARDIER SIGN LANDMARK AGREEMENT TO DELIVER THE NEXT GENERATION OF AVIATION TECHNOLOGY; HONEYWELL UPDATES 2024 OUTLOOK
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) announced the signing of a strategic agreement with Bombardier, a global leader in aviation and manufacturer of world-class business jets, to provide advanced technology for current and future Bombardier aircraft in avionics, propulsion and satellite communications technologies.
